# Test decisions - SHOULD parse and extract symbols
test_decision = {
    is_shown = {
        is_ruler = yes
    }
    is_valid = {
        gold >= 100
    }
    effect = {
        add_gold = -100
        add_prestige = 500
    }
}

another_decision = {
    is_shown = { always = yes }
    effect = { add_piety = 100 }
}
